#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    RaftServer &raftServ = GetRaftServer();
    uint64_t commitIndex;
    uint64_t term;
    bool res;
    auto m_obj = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    Log_debug("calling start for put for key %d",k);
    res = raftServ.Start(m_obj, &commitIndex, &term);
    ev->Wait(400000);
    if (!res)
    {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    else if (res)
    {
      if (raftServ.lastApplied >= commitIndex)
      {
        
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
      else
      {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    RaftServer &raftServ = GetRaftServer();
    uint64_t commitIndex;
    uint64_t term;
    bool res;
    auto m_obj = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    Log_debug("calling start for append for key %d",k);
    res = raftServ.Start(m_obj, &commitIndex, &term);
    ev->Wait(400000);
    if (!res)
    {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    else if (res)
    {
      if (raftServ.lastApplied >= commitIndex)
      {
        
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
      else
      {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
}



int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    RaftServer &raftServ = GetRaftServer();

    // lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(myMutex);
    uint64_t commitIndex;
    uint64_t term;
    bool res;
    auto m_obj = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    Log_debug("calling start for get");
    res = raftServ.Start(m_obj, &commitIndex, &term);
    ev->Wait(350000);
    if (!res)
    {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    else if (res)
    {
      if (raftServ.lastApplied >= commitIndex)
      {
        // if(kv_store_.find(k)!=kv_store_.end()){
        //   return KV_NOTLEADER;
        // }
        *v = kv_store_[k];
        
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
      else
      {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable *)(&m);
      /* your code here */

      // Coroutine::CreateRun([this, v]()
      //                      {
      
      auto opid = v->data_[0];
      auto operation = v->data_[1];
      //Log_info("in on next for op id %s",opid);
       Log_info("some infot in next command %s operation",operation);
      if(operation=="put"){
        kv_store_[v->data_[2]] = v->data_[3];
      }
      else if(operation=="append"){
        kv_store_[v->data_[2]] += v->data_[3];
      }
      //Log_info("trying to apply lastapplied?");
      RaftServer &raftS = GetRaftServer();


      raftS.lastApplied+=1;
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}



} // namespace janus;
